name: Stuck In A Loop (CursedSoul, BlueFear_Dev)
description:
A small rage game made in the process of a small challenge between CursedSoul and BlueFear_Dev.

If you beat the game you'll get the Devs respect! (All Levels are possible and tested!)

Don't be shy and show us your score in the comment section!

Don't worry if you rage quit the game, we save the last level for you!

Controls:

Movements: Arrows (or WASD)

Interact: F

Restart: R (Or use the beautiful UI button)

Pause: Escape

Check out: https://bluefear-dev.itch.io/

Music: https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle
